I can't get the antenna to work the way it's shown in the data sheet, I have 
a bar antenna with the smaller coil on the input, and one end of the larger 
side grounded,  the other side goes to a 3 foot wire. ( for those familialr 
wiht AM antennas)

There's a voice toward the end "people save us", wonder if it's the miners?

Frank-S
